name: Doppelgänger (itch) (SimonTS)
description:
Defeat your Doppelgänger. Know who you are.

We created a little platforming battle royale arena where its hard to distinguish between your main character and your useless Doppelgänger. Since your position is relativly unknown the goal is to survive as long as you can while avoiding traps.

WASD or arrow keys to move, Space or Y to jump

........................................................

Credits:

Character Controller Code by Brackeys

2D Extras by Unity Technologies

Music by Visager

Sounds via Bfxr

a Game by Simon Pähler & Sebastian Flöth. Created for GMTK-game(jam) 2018.

Theme: GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC

(battle royal but you can´t attack / platformer, but you don´t know your position)
